archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0510
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As Vodafone, we will always adhere to rules related to medical vulnerability, so that we don't disconnect customers with special medical needs. TBC Whether we can disconnect them, free access to emergency services might be fine

properties.value: Requirement TBC. Maybe "empty plan" is sufficient? Different customer journey is expected. Details to come from the legal department.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
